solution.text:
Inner diameter of hemisphere,\(d_1=_{k}_\)m\(\Rightarrow \)Inner radius,\(r_1=_{{k/Decimal(2)}}_\)m
Thickness of hemispherical structure\(=_{{j*10}}_\)cm\(=_{{j/Decimal(10)}}_\)m
Outer radius of hemisphere,\(r_2=r_1+\,\)thickness
\(=_{{k/Decimal(2)}}_+_{{j/Decimal(10)}}_=_{{(k/Decimal(2))+(j/Decimal(10))}}_\)m
Outer curved surface area of the hemisphere\(=2\pi r_2^2\)
\(=2\pi \times _{{(k/Decimal(2))+(j/Decimal(10))}}_^2\)
\(=_{{trunc((2*pi_val*((k/Decimal(2))+(j/Decimal(10)))**2),3)}}_m^2\)

content.text:
A hollow hemispherical structure, \(_{{j*10}}_\)cm in thickness has an inner diameter of \(_{k}_\)m.
Find the outer curved surface area of the structure.
